name: Gigamart E-commerce Batch
description: Batch ingestion of e-commerce orders from GCS to BigQuery raw layer (giga_raw.raw_ecom_orders).

parameters.name: input_pattern
parameters.label: Input GCS pattern
parameters.helpText: GCS file pattern for e-commerce orders (e.g. gs://<bucket>/ecom/*.json)

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table for raw e-commerce orders (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_ecom_orders)

parameters.name: dead_letter_table
parameters.label: Dead-letter table
parameters.helpText: Optional BigQuery table for failed e-commerce records (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_ecom_orders_dlq). If not set, errors are only logged.
